title.narrative: Strengthening Pakistan’s response to diabetic reti

description.narrative: The goal of the project is to contribute to the reduction of avoidable blindness due to Sight Threatening Diabetic Retinopathy (STDR) in three districts of Pakistan

participating-org.narrative: College of Ophthalmology and Allied Vision Sciences
